verses.verse: And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424>, full<WG4134> of the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151>, returned<WG5290> from<WG575> the Jordan<WG2446>, and<WG2532> was led<WG71> in<WG1722> the Spirit<WG4151> in<WG1519> the wilderness<WG2048>

during <WG3985> forty<WG5062> days<WG2250>, being<WG3985> tempted<WG3985> of<WG5259> the devil<WG1228>. And<WG2532> he did eat<WG5315> nothing3756, 3762 in<WG1722> those<WG1565> days<WG2250>: and<WG2532> when they<WG846> were completed<WG5305>, he hungered<WG3983>.

And <WG2532> the devil<WG1228> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, if<WG1487> thou art<WG1488> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>, command<WG2036> this<WG5129> stone<WG3037> that<WG2443> it become<WG1096> bread<WG740>.
And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> unto him<WG846>, It<WG3004> is written<WG1125>, Man<WG444> shall<WG2198> not<WG3756> live<WG2198> by<WG1909> bread<WG740> alone<WG3441>.
And <WG2532> he<WG1228> led<WG321> him<WG846> up<WG321>, and<WG3735> showed<WG1166> him<WG846> all<WG3956> the kingdoms<WG932> of the world<WG3625> in<WG1722> a moment<WG4743> of time<WG5550>.

And <WG2532> the devil<WG1228> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, To thee<WG4671> will I give<WG1325> all<WG537> this<WG3778> authority<WG1849>, and<WG2532> the glory<WG1391> of them<WG846>: for it<WG3754> hath been delivered<WG3860> unto me<WG1698>; and<WG2532> to whomsoever<WG1437> I will<WG2309> I give<WG1325> it<WG3739>.
If <WG1437> thou<WG4771> therefore<WG3767> wilt worship<WG4352> before<WG1799> me<WG3450>, it shall all<WG3956> be<WG2071> thine<WG4675>.

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, It is written<WG1125>, Thou shalt worship<WG4352> the Lord<WG2962> thy<WG4675> God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> him<WG846> only<WG3441> shalt thou serve<WG3000>.

And <WG2532> he led<WG71> him<WG846> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2419>, and<WG2532> set<WG2476> him<WG846> on<WG1909> the pinnacle<WG4419> of the temple<WG2411>, and<WG2532> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, If<WG1487> thou art<WG1488> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>, cast<WG906> thyself<WG4572> down<WG2736> from hence<WG1782>:
for <WG1063> it is written<WG1125>, He shall give<WG1781> his<WG846> angels<WG32> charge<WG1781> concerning<WG4012> thee<WG4675>, to guard<WG1314> thee<WG3754>:
and <WG2532>, On<WG1909> their hands<WG5495> they shall bear<WG142> thee<WG4571> up<WG142>, Lest haply<WG3379> thou dash<WG4350> thy<WG4675> foot<WG4228> against<WG4314> a stone<WG3754>.
And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, It is said<WG2046>, Thou shalt<WG1598> not<WG3756> make trial<WG1598> of the Lord<WG2962> thy<WG4675> God<WG3754>.
And <WG2532> when<WG4931> the devil<WG1228> had completed<WG4931> every<WG3956> temptation<WG3986>, he departed<WG868> from<WG575> him<WG846> for<WG891> a season<WG2540>.

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> returned<WG5290> in<WG1722> the power<WG1411> of the Spirit<WG4151> into<WG1519> Galilee<WG1056>: and<WG2532> a fame<WG5345> went out<WG1831> concerning<WG4012> him<WG846> through<WG2596> all<WG3650> the region round about<WG4012>.
And <WG2532> he<WG846> taught<WG1321> in<WG1722> their<WG846> synagogues<WG4864>, being glorified<WG1392> of<WG5259> all<WG3956>.

And <WG2532> he came<WG2064> to<WG1519> Nazareth<WG3478>, where<WG3757> he had been<WG2258> brought up<WG5142>: and<WG2532> he entered<WG1525>, as<WG2596> his<WG846> custom was<WG1486>, into<WG1519> the synagogue<WG4864> on<WG1722> the sabbath<WG4521> day<WG2250>, and<WG2532> stood up<WG450> to read<WG314>.

And <WG2532> there was delivered<WG1929> unto him<WG846> the book<WG975> of the prophet<WG4396> Isaiah<WG2268>. And<WG2532> he opened<WG380> the book<WG975>, and found<WG2147> the place<WG5117> where<WG3757> it was<WG2258> written<WG1125>,

The Spirit<WG4151> of the Lord<WG2962> is upon<WG1909> me<WG1691>, Because<WG1752> he anointed<WG5548> me<WG3165> to preach good tidings<WG2097> to the poor<WG4434>: He hath sent<WG649> me<WG3165> to proclaim<WG2784> release<WG859> to the captives<WG164>, And<WG2532> recovering of sight<WG309> to the blind<WG5185>, To set<WG649> at<WG1722> liberty<WG859> them that are bruised<WG3739>,
To proclaim<WG2784> the acceptable<WG1184> year<WG1763> of the Lord<WG2962>.

And <WG2532> he closed<WG4428> the book<WG975>, and gave<WG591> it back<WG591> to the attendant<WG5257>, and sat down<WG2523>: and<WG2532> the eyes<WG3788> of all<WG3956> in<WG1722> the synagogue<WG4864> were<WG2258> fastened<WG816> on him<WG846>.
And <WG1161> he began<WG756> to say<WG3004> unto<WG4314> them<WG846>, To-day<WG4594> hath<WG4137> this<WG3778> scripture<WG1124> been fulfilled<WG4137> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> ears<WG3775>.

And <WG2532> all<WG3956> bare<WG3140> him<WG846> witness<WG3140>, and<WG2532> wondered<WG2296> at<WG1909> the<WG3056> words<WG3056> of grace<WG5485> which<WG3588> proceeded<WG1607> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750>: and<WG2532> they said<WG3004>, Is<WG2076> not<WG3756> this<WG3778> Joseph<WG2501>'s son<WG5207>?

And <WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them<WG846>, Doubtless<WG3843> ye will<WG2046> say<WG2046> unto<WG4314> me<WG3427> this<WG3778> parable<WG3850>, Physician<WG2395>, heal<WG2323> thyself<WG4572>: whatsoever<WG3745> we have heard<WG191> done<WG1096> at<WG1722> Capernaum<WG2584>, do<WG4160> also<WG2532> here<WG5602> in<WG1722> thine own country<WG3968>.
And <WG1161> he said<WG2036>, Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, No<WG3762> prophet<WG4396> is<WG2076> acceptable<WG1184> in<WG1722> his own<WG846> country<WG3968>.

But <WG1161> of<WG1909> a truth<WG225> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, There were<WG2258> many<WG4183> widows<WG5503> in<WG1722> Israel<WG2474> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of Elijah<WG2243>, when<WG3753> the heaven<WG3772> was shut up2808, Esther9 three<WG5140> years<WG2094> and<WG2532> six<WG1803> months<WG3376>, when<WG5613> there came<WG1096> a great<WG3173> famine<WG3042> over<WG1909> all<WG3956> the land<WG1093>;

and <WG2532> unto<WG4314> none<WG3762> of them<WG846> was<WG3992> Elijah<WG2243> sent<WG1487>, but<WG2532> only to<WG1519> Zarephath<WG4558>, in the land of Sidon<WG4605>, unto<WG4314> a woman<WG1135> that was a widow<WG5503>.

And <WG2532> there were<WG2258> many<WG4183> lepers<WG3015> in<WG1722> Israel<WG2474> in the time<WG1909> of Elisha<WG1666> the prophet<WG4396>; and<WG2532> none<WG3762> of them<WG846> was cleansed<WG1487>, but<WG3361> only Naaman<WG3497> the Syrian<WG4948>.
And <WG2532> they<WG3956> were all filled<WG4130> with wrath<WG2372> in<WG1722> the synagogue<WG4864>, as they heard<WG191> these things<WG5023>;

and <WG2532> they rose up<WG450>, and cast<WG1544> him<WG846> forth out of<WG1854> the city<WG4172>, and<WG2532> led<WG71> him<WG846> unto<WG2193> the brow<WG3790> of the hill<WG3735> whereon<WG1909> their<WG846> city<WG4172> was built<WG3618>, that<WG1519> they might throw<WG2630> him<WG846> down headlong<WG3739>.
But <WG1161> he<WG846> passing<WG1330> through<WG1223> the midst<WG3319> of them<WG846> went his way<WG4198>.
And <WG2532> he came down<WG2718> to<WG1519> Capernaum<WG2584>, a city<WG4172> of Galilee<WG1056>. And<WG2532> he was<WG2258> teaching<WG1321> them<WG846> on<WG1722> the sabbath day<WG4521>:
and <WG2532> they were astonished<WG1605> at<WG1909> his<WG846> teaching<WG1322>; for<WG3754> his<WG846> word<WG3056> was<WG2258> with<WG1722> authority<WG1849>.

And <WG2532> in<WG1722> the synagogue<WG4864> there was<WG2258> a man<WG444>, that had<WG2192> a spirit<WG4151> of an unclean<WG169> demon<WG1140>; and<WG2532> he cried out<WG349> with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456>,

Ah <WG5101>! what have we to do<WG2254> with thee<WG4671>, Jesus<WG2424> thou Nazarene<WG3479>? art thou come<WG2064> to destroy<WG622> us<WG2248>? I know<WG1492> thee<WG4571> who<WG5101> thou art<WG1488>, the Holy One<WG40> of God<WG2316>.

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> rebuked<WG2008> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Hold thy peace<WG5392>, and<WG2532> come out<WG1831> of<WG1537> him<WG846>. And when<WG2532> the demon<WG1140> had thrown<WG4496> him<WG846> down in<WG1519> the midst<WG3319>, he came<WG1831> out of<WG575> him<WG846>, having done him<WG846> no<WG3367> hurt<WG984>.

And <WG2532> amazement<WG2285> came<WG1096> upon<WG1909> all<WG3956>, and<WG2532> they spake<WG4814> together<WG4314>, one with another<WG240>, saying<WG3004>, What<WG5101> is this<WG3778> word<WG3056>? for<WG3754> with<WG1722> authority<WG1849> and<WG2532> power<WG1411> he commandeth<WG2004> the unclean<WG169> spirits<WG4151>, and<WG2532> they come out<WG1831>.
And <WG2532> there went forth<WG1607> a rumor<WG2279> concerning him<WG846> into<WG1519> every<WG3956> place<WG5117> of the region round about<WG4066>.

And <WG1161> he rose<WG450> up<WG450> from the synagogue<WG4864>, and entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the house<WG3614> of<WG1537> Simon<WG1161>. And Simon<WG4613>'s wife<WG3994>'s mother was<WG2258> holden with<WG4912> a great<WG3173> fever<WG4446>; and<WG2532> they besought<WG2065> him<WG846> for<WG4012> her<WG846>.

And <WG2532> he stood<WG2186> over<WG1883> her<WG846>, and rebuked<WG2008> the fever<WG4446>; and<WG2532> it left<WG863> her<WG846>: and<WG1161> immediately<WG3916> she rose<WG450> up and ministered<WG1247> unto them<WG846>.

And when<WG1161> the sun<WG2246> was setting<WG1416>, all<WG3956> they that<WG3745> had<WG2192> any sick<WG770> with divers<WG4164> diseases<WG3554> brought<WG71> them<WG846> unto<WG4314> him<WG846>; and<WG1161> he laid<WG2007> his hands<WG5495> on every<WG1538> one<WG1520> of them<WG846>, and healed<WG2323> them<WG846>.

And <WG1161> demons<WG1140> also<WG2532> came out<WG1831> from<WG575> many<WG4183>, crying out<WG2896>, and<WG2532> saying<WG3754>, Thou<WG4771> art<WG1488> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>. And<WG2532> rebuking<WG2008> them<WG846>, he suffered<WG1439> them<WG846> not<WG3756> to speak<WG2980>, because<WG3754> they knew<WG1492> that he<WG846> was<WG1511> the Christ<WG5547>.

And <WG1161> when it was<WG1096> day<WG2250>, he came out<WG1831> and went<WG4198> into<WG1519> a desert<WG2048> place<WG5117>: and<WG2532> the multitudes<WG3793> sought<WG2212> after him<WG846>, and<WG2532> came<WG2064> unto<WG2193> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> would have stayed<WG2722> him<WG846>, that he should not<WG3361> go<WG4198> from<WG575> them<WG846>.

But <WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them<WG3754>, I<WG3165> must<WG1163> preach<WG2097> the good tidings of the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> to<WG1519> the other<WG2087> cities<WG4172> also<WG2532>: for<WG3754> therefore<WG5124> was I sent<WG649>.
And <WG2532> he was<WG2258> preaching<WG2784> in<WG1722> the synagogues<WG4864> of Galilee<WG1056>.
